sentences.en: Although things are changing the medical establishment is still overwhelmingly male.
sentences.cn: 虽然世易时移，但医学界依然是男性的天下。

sentences.en: He is highly disdainful of anything to do with the literary establishment.
sentences.cn: 他对任何与文学界权威沾边的事都嗤之以鼻。

sentences.en: He opens a high - class millinery establishment.
sentences.cn: 他开设 高档 妇人用帽店.

sentences.en: His work as a historian brought him into conflict with the political establishment.
sentences.cn: 他是一位历史学家，工作的缘故使他处在了和政界的当权者对立的位置上。

sentences.en: More immediately, Iraq and the Iraqi military establishment will escape destruction.
sentences.cn: 目前更为紧迫的是, 伊拉克和伊拉克的军队要免遭毁灭.

sentences.en: The British establishment seems to be off on another quest for fool's gold.
sentences.cn: 这家英国机构似乎开始了又一次徒劳无功的探索。

sentences.en: The committee will work toward the establishment of a school for the handicapped.
sentences.cn: 该委员会将为建立一所残疾学校而努力.

sentences.en: The Establishment has reached a decision.
The establishment of new international economic order is the essence of his article.
sentences.cn: 他文章的主题是建立国际经济新秩序.

sentences.en: The establishment of the regional government in 1980 did not end terrorism.
sentences.cn: 1980年地区政府的成立并没有结束恐怖主义。

sentences.en: The fusty old establishment refused to recognise the demand for popular music.
sentences.cn: 这一古板的老旧机构拒绝承认人们对流行音乐的需求。

sentences.en: The hotel is a comfortable and well-run establishment.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆环境舒适且经营良好。

sentences.en: The hotel is a well - run establishment.
sentences.cn: 这旅店是一家经营完善的企业.

sentences.en: The musical Establishment think he is a musical genius.
sentences.cn: 音乐界权威人士认为他是个音乐天才.

sentences.en: What do you expect? This is the Establishment we're taking on.
sentences.cn: 你还期望什么？我们要应对的是“权威”。

sentences.en: With the establishment of major new markets, the economy is thriving.
sentences.cn: 随着重大新市场的建立, 经济越来越兴旺.

words.tran_cn: 确定的；已制定的，已建立的

trans.tran_cn: 机构，企业，建立，（通常反对变革的）当权派，权威
trans.tran_en: the act of starting an organization, relationship, or system
